sentences.en: I wish to take this opportunity to extend to you cordial greetings and best wishes of the Chinese Government and people!
sentences.cn: 借此机会，我谨代表中国政府和人民，向在座各位，致以诚挚的祝贺和良好的祝愿！

sentences.en: He had never known him to be so chatty and cordial.
sentences.cn: 他以前从来不知道他是这样一个健谈而友善的人。

sentences.en: One taught me reading, the other taught me composition, both of whom were cordial and strict.
sentences.cn: 一个教我阅读，一个教我写作，他们都是诚恳而严格的。
